thread.title: Dalmatian Owner

author: Dalmatian Owner
title: Dalmatian Owner
text: I bought some orchids for my recently deceased mothers Birthday. They had to be sent to my Father's address, for him to place them on her grave and they arrived in perfect condition on the day they said they would. I didn't need to contact them and there were updates whenever there needed to be one ie: when they were delivered safely. Thank you Serenata Flowers for your excellent service.
